units.title: Pooling PSC lines before organoid generation
units.text: we pooled PSC lines (5,000 cells per line) before organoid generation
units.rationale: Describes the initial step for creating mosaic organoids by combining cells from multiple donors.

units.title: Longitudinal assessment of proliferation via flow cytometry
units.text: we longitudinally assessed the proliferation rate of organoids derived from individual lines in two differentiation replicates through flow cytometry-based cell cycle analysis
units.rationale: Provides a concrete method to monitor cell proliferation over time.

units.title: Immunofluorescence characterization of mCBOs
units.text: We first characterized mCBOs by immunofluorescence for canonical markers of neurodevelopment previously defined for organoids
units.rationale: Specifies a validation step using established neurodevelopmental markers.

units.title: Implementation of multiplexing strategies
units.text: We thus implemented and benchmarked complementary strategies to multiplex human brain organoidogenesis in vitro, pooling PSCs from different individuals either during organoid generation, or before scRNA-seq library preparation
units.rationale: Summarizes the two experimental multiplexing approaches.

units.title: Development of SCanSNP computational pipeline
units.text: We set out to develop a new method, SCanSNP (Fig. 3a), to overcome the observed limitations by (1) dividing the classification challenge into two steps, one for identity assignment and one for doublet detection and (2) measuring the genetic purity of each droplet to identify low-quality droplets and separate them from authentic doublets
units.rationale: Outlines the core steps of the newly created deconvolution algorithm.

units.title: Benchmarking deconvolution tools and consensus call
units.text: we benchmarked them against existing deconvolution tools, producing a consensus pipeline for robust genotype identification across data sets of different quality
units.rationale: Describes the comparative evaluation and creation of a consensus framework.

units.title: Demultiplexing with multiple algorithms and merging results
units.text: Next, we performed demultiplexing again using all the above tools and merging their outcomes into one combined output (Fig. 3b)
units.rationale: Details the procedure for integrating results from several demultiplexing methods.

units.title: Generation of individually derived CBOs and downstream pooling
units.text: CBOs were generated individually from the PSC lines and pooled them only after organoid dissociation for single-cell library preparation
units.rationale: Specifies the downstream multiplexing workflow where pooling occurs postâ€‘dissociation.

units.title: Scalability modeling of multiplexing combinations
units.text: We evaluated the two multiplexing paradigms through a deep reconstruction of neurodevelopmental trajectories, provided proof of principle of their suitability for linking genetic variation to neurodevelopmental trajectory phenotypes and modeled the scalability of the system, analyzing different multiplexing combinations with an increasing number of lines
units.rationale: Explains how the authors assessed and modeled the scalability of their multiplexing approaches.
